indonesian_foods.name: Nasi Goreng
indonesian_foods.short_description: Iconic Indonesian fried rice with sweet soy sauce, served with fried egg, chicken, and prawn crackers.

indonesian_foods.name: Rendang
indonesian_foods.short_description: Slow-cooked caramelized beef in coconut milk and spices, voted world's most delicious food.

indonesian_foods.name: Sate Ayam
indonesian_foods.short_description: Grilled chicken skewers served with rich peanut sauce, rice cake, and sweet soy sauce.

indonesian_foods.name: Gado-gado
indonesian_foods.short_description: Mixed vegetables with tofu, tempeh, and egg, dressed in peanut sauce dressing.

indonesian_foods.name: Soto Ayam
indonesian_foods.short_description: Traditional chicken soup with turmeric broth, vermicelli, eggs, and aromatic herbs.

indonesian_foods.name: Beef Bakso
indonesian_foods.short_description: Indonesian meatballs in clear soup with noodles, bok choy, and crispy fried shallots.

indonesian_foods.name: Nasi Uduk
indonesian_foods.short_description: Fragrant coconut rice served with various side dishes like chicken, tempeh, and sambal.

indonesian_foods.name: Mie Goreng
indonesian_foods.short_description: Stir-fried noodles with chicken, vegetables, and sweet soy sauce, topped with fried shallots.

indonesian_foods.name: Sambal Udang
indonesian_foods.short_description: Spicy stir-fried shrimp in chili sauce with petai beans and lime leaves.

indonesian_foods.name: Sop Buntut
indonesian_foods.short_description: Rich oxtail soup with carrots, potatoes, and celery in clear aromatic broth.

indonesian_foods.name: Martabak Telur
indonesian_foods.short_description: Stuffed savory pancake with minced meat, eggs, and green onions, served with curry sauce.

indonesian_foods.name: Nasi Campur
indonesian_foods.short_description: Mixed rice plate with various sides like rendang, egg, vegetables, and sambal.

indonesian_foods.name: Sate Lilit
indonesian_foods.short_description: Balinese minced fish satay wrapped around lemongrass stalks, grilled to perfection.

indonesian_foods.name: Bebek Goreng
indonesian_foods.short_description: Crispy fried duck served with steamed rice, vegetables, and spicy sambal.

indonesian_foods.name: Pisang Goreng
indonesian_foods.short_description: Deep-fried battered banana fritters, popular street food snack served with palm sugar.
